definition: hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan

sentences.english: The filiform needle can also be fitted out for traditional electric acupuncture therapy.
sentences.chinese: 也可配用毫针进行传统电针灸治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To find out an effective acupuncture therapy for children allergic rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨美容毫针针刺治疗儿童变应性鼻炎的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effect of the therapy with filiform needlings and heat needlings on chronic lumbar muscle strain.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察毫针火针治疗慢性腰肌劳损的临床疗效。

sentences.english: To prepare a piece of paper pad or cotton pad for needling practice.
sentences.chinese: 准备毫针刺法练习用的纸垫或棉垫。

definition: to prick with a needle/to treat by acupuncture
to leave an inserted needle in place for a period of time (acupuncture)
silver needle (fine needle used in acupuncture)
see 注射針|注射针[zhu4 she4 zhen1]
needle used in embroidery or sewing/acupuncture needle/orange day-lily (Hemerocallis fulva)
acupuncture and moxibustion/to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion
fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)

acupuncture point (any point on any meridian)/category of 12 specific acupuncture points near the wrist or ankle, each lying on a different meridian (one of five categories collectively termed 五輸穴|五输穴)
